data.homeworkTitle: 第四章 10脊柱与四肢评估

questions.title: 肢体完全瘫痪，其肌力为
青年胸椎后凸多见于
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"佝偻病","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"胸椎骨折","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"胸椎结核","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"胸椎肿瘤","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"类风湿脊柱炎","IsAnswer":false}]

questions.title: 检查脊椎，可出现压痛和叩痛的是
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"佝偻病","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"骨质退行性变","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"慢性胸膜粘连","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"氟骨症","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"脊椎结核","IsAnswer":true}]
questions.resultAnalysis: 本题考察的是学生对脊柱压痛及叩击痛的熟悉程度。脊柱压痛及叩击痛阳性见于脊柱结核、脊椎骨折、脊椎肿瘤及椎间盘突出等。

questions.title: 引起膝内外翻最常见的病因是
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"缺铁性贫血","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"脊髓灰质炎","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"慢性肺气肿","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"关节脱位","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"佝偻病","IsAnswer":true}]
questions.resultAnalysis: 本题考察的是学生对四肢评估的熟悉程度。膝内外翻常见病因是佝偻病。

questions.title: “剪刀步”是哪个关节的异常
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"肩关节","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"肘关节","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"腕关节","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"髋关节","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"膝关节","IsAnswer":false}]
questions.resultAnalysis: 本题考察的是学生对四肢评估的熟悉程度。髋关节内收畸形可见双下肢交叉呈“剪刀步”。

questions.title: 匙状指多见于
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"风湿热","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"心脏病","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"支气管扩张","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"缺铁性贫血","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"肢端肥大","IsAnswer":false}]
questions.resultAnalysis: 本题考察的是学生对四肢评估的熟悉程度。匙状指多见于缺铁性贫血等。

questions.title: 脊柱过度向前凸出性弯曲，称脊柱前凸，多发生于
questions.resultAnalysis: 本题考察的是学生对脊柱病理性变形的熟悉程度。脊柱前凸多发生在脊柱腰段。

questions.title: 引起腕垂症最常见的病因是
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"桡神经损伤","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"佝偻病","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"缺铁性贫血","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"慢性肺气肿","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"脉管炎","IsAnswer":false}]
questions.resultAnalysis: 本题考察的是学生对四肢评估的熟悉程度。引起腕垂症最常见的病因是桡神经损伤。
